summary: An Emperial Female Save Game with some added Stuff...
descriptionHtml:
An Emperial Female Save Game with some added Stuff at the biginnig of the Story. First Town. Talked to nobody. Its from the German Game Version. But should work with every Version I Guess.

Savegame,Screenshots,Readme


Readme:

Crystal Savegame:

2 Light Armor Sets
Necklace +50% Health Reg Speed
Necklace +50% Stamina Reg Speed
100.000 Gold
1000 Lockpicks
Vpkun Mask 20% less Magicka use for Summon, Illusion and Alteration
Carryweigt set to 10.000

Have Fun :)


P.S. its from the German version. Maybe u have to rename the file
author: NeonoName
